snippet: Despite the widespread use of affirmative action at elite colleges, blacks and Latinos are much more likely to attend colleges with low graduation rates.
lead_paragraph: Despite the widespread use of affirmative action at elite colleges, blacks and Latinos are much more likely to attend colleges with low graduation rates.

headline.seo: At Elite Colleges, an Admissions Gap for Minorities
headline.main: At Elite Colleges, an Admissions Gap for Minorities
